import{createSlice,createAsyncThunk}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import axios from'axios';export const signup=createAsyncThunk('auth/signup',async userData=>{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/auth/signup',userData);// Corrected URL
return response.data;});export const login=createAsyncThunk('auth/login',async(credentials,thunkAPI)=>{try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/auth/login',credentials);localStorage.setItem('userId',response.data.userId);localStorage.setItem('userName',response.data.name);return response.data;}catch(error){return thunkAPI.rejectWithValue(error.response.data);}});const authSlice=createSlice({name:'auth',initialState:{user:null,status:'idle',error:null},reducers:{logout:state=>{state.user=null;state.token=null;localStorage.removeItem('token');}},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addCase(login.pending,state=>{state.status='loading';}).addCase(login.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.status='succeeded';state.user=action.payload;}).addCase(login.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.status='failed';state.error=action.payload;});}});export const{logout}=authSlice.actions;export default authSlice.reducer;
